summary: An energetic, motivated and responsible young developer. I enjoy learning new technologies and want to improve my skills that I acquired at university and studied independently and grow as a developer. Now I'm developing on React.js/Node.js. I graduated from Art School, like design and my creativity helps me in front- end development, and I would like to use it in my work.

Group management. Key Achievements: I worked as a team leader, developed a working application, and deployed it to a web server.

experience.title: Frontend developer
